cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on December 8, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4616, Adjustable Interest Rate (LIBOR) Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SHERMAN:
H.R. 4616.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The power granted to Congress under Article I, Section 8,
Clauses 1 and 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H3844]

latestAction.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

title: Adjustable Interest Rate (LIBOR) Act of 2021
